entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
